name: Cave Plane
description:
You will enter a dark procedural generated cave with your aircraft. 

Your goal is to not crash. Go as far as you can!

Shoot to see the cave,  because there's no light, and blow out the destructible cave blocks in front of you, but be careful not to overheat the machine gun!

Press up arrow to go up  and Space bar to shoot. To pause, press Escape.

Made for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 144 with the theme 'In the Dark'
